TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit NonceCache extends System.Object

Docs.summary: An abstract base class that represents a cache for nonces.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the class.
Gets or sets the maximum size of the cache specified as the number of nonces that the cache can contain.
Docs.value: The maximum size of the cache specified as the number of nonces that the cache can contain.
Docs.exception: An attempt to set a value that is less than zero occurs.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the maximum timespan after which a nonce is deleted from the cache.
Docs.value: The maximum timespan after which a nonce is deleted from the cache. This value should be at least twice the maximum clock skew added to the replay window size.
Docs.exception:
An attempt to set a value that is less than <xref:System.TimeSpan> occurs.
-or-
An attempt to set a value greater than the allowed maximum occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CheckNonce(unsigned int8[] nonce) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the specified nonce is already in the cache.
Docs.returns: if the specified nonce is already in the cache; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryAddNonce(unsigned int8[] nonce) cil managed

Docs.param: The nonce to add to the cache.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to add the specified nonce to the cache.
Docs.returns: if the nonce was added to the cache; otherwise, .
